banner.text: **PUZZLE:** I have it on good authority that levitating a starship is no different to moving rocks, itâ€™s only different in your mind. Either way, use the code blocks, and your hand, to solve the puzzle and raise the X-wing.
banner.hint: Apply a force inside a loop to push the X-Wing upwards

banner.text: Wow, you did it. No trying for you. But how will you use your new powers?
